titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Debra Bernhardt Oral History Collection OH.043

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-05-14 16:22:35 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the Debra Bernhardt Oral History Collection is restricted until 2026.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Interviews conducted by Janet Green, Director of the Harry Van Arsdale Labor History Project at the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives in 2001. The accession number associated with this collection is 2001.004.

phystech.head: Audiovisual Access Policies and Procedures
phystech.p: Audiovisual materials have not been preserved and may not be available to researchers. Materials not yet digitized will need to have access copies made before they can be used. To request an access copy, or if you are unsure if an item has been digitized, please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu with the collection name, collection number, and a description of the item(s) requested. A staff member will respond to you with further information.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu.
